Class NavigationHandler

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.components.navigation.NavigationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
INavigationHandler
public class NavigationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements INavigationHandler

Base implementation of the INavigationHandler to manage the axis using TMAPI functions.

Author:
Sven Krosse

Method Detail

getSupportedNavigationAxis

public java.util.Collection<INavigationAxis> getSupportedNavigationAxis(org.tmapi.core.Construct construct)
                                                                 throws NavigationException
Retrieve all navigation axis, which supports the given topic map construct. The returned set can not be null, but can be empty.

Specified by:
getSupportedNavigationAxis in interface INavigationHandler
Parameters:
construct - the given topic map construct
Returns:
a set of supported navigation axis
Throws:
NavigationException - navigation failed

                                                                        org.tmapi.core.Construct optional)
                                                                 throws NavigationException
Retrieve all navigation axis, which supports the given topic map construct and the optional parameter. The returned set can not be null, but can be empty.

Specified by:
getSupportedNavigationAxis in interface INavigationHandler
Parameters:
construct - the given topic map construct
optional - the optional parameter
Returns:
a set of supported navigation axis

lookup

public INavigationAxis lookup(NavigationAxis type)
                       throws UnsupportedNavigationTypeException
Retrieve the navigation axis instance for the given type. Method can throws an exception if the type is unknown or unregistered. It can never return null.

Specified by:
lookup in interface INavigationHandler
Parameters:
type - the given type of navigation axis
Returns:
the instance of the navigation axis
Throws:
UnsupportedNavigationTypeException - unknown or unregistered type.
